title: 464. Will Work-from-Home Work Forever?
description: The pandemic may be winding down, but that doesn’t mean we’ll return to full-time commuting and packed office buildings. The greatest accidental experiment in the history of labor has lessons to teach us about productivity, flexibility, and even reversing the brain drain. But don’t buy another dozen pairs of sweatpants just yet.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
